abstract: The decision to replace inflaters in Takata airbags previously judged to be safe adds 1.6 million vehicles to the world’s biggest auto safety recall.
snippet: The decision to replace inflaters in Takata airbags previously judged to be safe adds 1.6 million vehicles to the world’s biggest auto safety recall.
lead_paragraph: TOKYO — Toyota Motor said on Wednesday it would replace potentially dangerous airbag inflaters in 1.6 million vehicles in Japan that it had previously judged were safe, further expanding the world’s biggest auto safety recall.

headline.main: Toyota Expands Airbag Recall in Japan
headline.print_headline: Toyota Expands Airbag Recall in Japan by 1.6 Million
